result.title: Effects of discards ban on seabirds
result.description: Report including population trajectories predictions for 3 scavenging species Balearic shearwater Audouins gull and yellowlegged gull considering different degrees of discards availability For the two species included in the Bird Directive of the EU BS and AsG the report will also provide probabilities of extinction depending on discard availability Manuscript submission on a peer reviewed journal will be associated with this deliverable
